amazing game
虽然前面很氛围压抑，但是都被结尾的歌治愈好拉
花了3个多小时打通关了，关卡难度有，但是基本自己观察周围就能解决，挺不错的，益智解密和有趣的平衡吧。
Great funny puzzle game.

Naprosto originální námět. Konečně hra, u které né že můžete, dokonce musíte zapojit mozkové závity. Bohužel jsem hru dohrál za pouhé 4 hodiny a to jsem se občas pořádně zasekl. I přesto si tento titul zaslouží skvělé hodnocení už jen díky tomuto bezkonkurenčnímu nápadu.

Very cool, this game is great
But too short for smart guys like me :( only 3H of gameplay

If your here to watch how to portal then YOU'RE IN THE RIGHT PLACE!!
If not GTFO
Step 1: Build blue opening on either top or below
Step 2: Build orange opening either the top (if blue opening is below) and vice versa
Step 3: Make sure it's straight to each other
Step 4: ????
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HWA3Jjwr1Lo]Step 5: Profit![/url]

Ох-х, это было классно! Покупала по скидке, не жалею ни копейки потраченных денег. Любителям головоломок игра обязательна к покупке. 
P.s. Глэдос милашка. :")

买的第一款游戏, 早就听说过Portal的大名, 然而一直没有买. 现在也是被朋友带着入了Steam的大坑. Portal的世界观非常有趣, 算是益智类游戏里相当经典的一款了, 暑假促销和Portal2一起购入, 我觉得相当划得来.
第一遍打的时候坚持没有看攻略, 除了中间有一个小关稍微卡了一下. 通关之后的挑战模式彻底把我打残, 到最后实在没有耐心了, 看了通关视频发现仍然不可能通, 于是[spoiler]最终还是掏出了控制台命令代码, [/spoiler]把剩下的几个成就集齐, 原谅我这个手残儿童吧...
作为一个推理解谜爱好者, 强推之~
Интересная игра , класные загадки , прошол с первого раза , всем рекомендую
How somebody can hate this game? peace of art 11/5
It is a great game and works well on laptops without lag
jogo muito bom,leve d+.Vale a pena
我是先玩的2代后玩的初代，感觉还是那么有趣！开创性的玩法，烧脑的关卡，喜欢V社的同学此生不玩后悔终生！

Сделана игра на 100/10 завораживате своимим логическими и физическими явлениями, одно огорчило, короткий сюжет, мое прохождение заняло 5 часов, но это было очень интересное времяпровождение.
Рекомендую.
10/10 ПорталГанов

Il gioco non è doppiato, ma ci sono sottotitoli di buona qualità, fatti molto bene.

На мой взгляд, серия игр portal - одна из лучших разработок Valve. Вполне неплохая по тому времени графика, интересный сюжет и действительно забавные комментарии от Глэдис во время прохождения. К тому же игра настроена на развитие логического мышления, использования элементарных знаний физики и владение быстрой реакцией. Поэтому портал можно считать одной из самых достойных игр своего жанра
Buy it.. It's worth it, trust me.. :)
Если вы знакомы с играми Valve, но по какой-либо причине обошли стороной  Portal, то значит вы лжете и не знакомы с играми Valve. Иных поводов не играть в нее просто нет.
Good game, makes you think about everything in the last levels it gets really exciting.
这绝对是一部神作 ，十分良心 。自带中文不说，游戏中还有各种细节等待发掘。结局我并没有看太懂，但是最后的那首歌莫名感动。而且通关之后连进入游戏的背景都改了！
An awesome puzzle game that keeps you thinking from start to finish, a great sense of humour in the game and a great addition to The Orange Box.

Отличная игра, особенно подходящая для детей до 12 лет, ибо лучше играть .в интересню, захватывающую головоломку, чем с 5 лет играть в "Контра сити","Батлу","Варфейс" и прочую чушь. Думаю, игра будет интересна вообще в любом возрасте. Хороший геймплей и сюжет. Все понравилось!

I got the bundle with both Portal and Portal 2.
I finally played this game and I'm regretting not buying it before :D
Interesting lore and some tricky puzzles, pretty short though... Highly recommended!
Its an amazing game with a good ending

No preguntes. Tschh, tschh, calla. He dicho que no preguntes. Cómpralo. Portal y también su segunda entrega. ¿Cómo que no sabes? ¿Te he mentido alguna vez yo? Anda, anda. Hazte un favor. Además, no es tan caro. Bidones de petróleo debería valer esto. ¡Si es que te lo están dejando a huevo!
Portal es un juego de puzzles con una historia muy pequeñita y sutil, pero llena de detalles que la hacen inolvidable. Y hablo en nombre de Portal 2 también, no nos olvidemos. Repleto de humor sarcástico, este juego es una de las obras de arte más memorables de toda la industria. Ni siquiera quiero desvelar mucho en este análisis. 
Anda, corre, que sé que ya no hace falta convencerte :D

Portal, it's a short and sweet puzzle game.

The game can be finished in under 5 hours (some areas can take longer than expected) or maybe a bit longer than 5 hours if you want to get all the achievements, and it has a neat storyline to the game mostly putting a cliffhanger for Portal 2. At the end of the game, you are greeted with a musical, I won't spoil anything but it was funny and neat to have.

If you need a cheap game to play but something addictive that will make you love the Portal series, Portal is a must have game to buy.

The cake is a lie!
One of the best games I've ever played
伟大创意的结晶，在当年的游戏界绝对是脑洞爆炸的存在。难度设计恰到好处，解密成功的成就感难以言表。它也是一款实验性质的作品，相比二代而言流程实在太短，令人意犹未尽，谜题整体难度略低于二代，有一些关卡讲究操作的精准与时机的把握。作为一名先玩二代的玩家，仍然沉迷于其中无法自拔，通关后回味无穷。与此同时而最遗憾的是：G胖不会数三。重要的事情说三遍，G胖不会数三，G胖不会数三！
ai对白好人性化，后面气氛营造的很好，又紧张又恐怖的~~不错
The cake isn't a lie ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
fun to play
całkiem całkiem, nie za łatwa, nie za trudna lecz w sam raz. W 8 godzin na spokojnie da się przejść

Aventure et atmosphère très prenante durant cette escapade dans le complexe d'Aperture Science.

Un gameplay sacrément efficace avec un dosage parfait au niveau de la difficulté des énigmes à résoudre !

Un environnement très mystérieux que ce soit au niveau du lieu, des personnages ou de l'intrigue, qui dégage une ambiance perturbante ce qui en résulte un jeu très plaisant à parcourir mais qui bénéficie hélas d'une durée de vie très courte.

Néanmoins, les défis rajoutent un réel challenge et mettront le joueur à rude épreuve, bon courage !

игра нормальная стоит внемание

I bought this game during the Steam Sale and I absolutely loved it. The Lore. The Fanfiction. The Community. I even got the game in a bundle during the sale. So I got 80% off both games Portal 1 and Portal 2 Then subtract 25% of that and paid 3.18$. Amazing. The funny thing is, I bought this game with money I spent on a case from cs:go after trying the game. I got a UMP Primal unbox, minW. First unbox too in that game. Sold it. then bought this bundle.

I know nothing will change in this game, it's already perfect. It's amazing. I just wish they put a third portal game out there. Honestly.
I will be honest though, I didn't know what this game was actually. And you could say I took a 'leap of faith'(portal included) when buying it.

I would play this game again and again, if only I didn't remember or had experence of doing it beforehand. Because it's like a drug and will never be as good as the first time.

Play it like a drug anyway though.
确实经典，不过感觉有点恐怖游戏的感觉

Suberb game, I had so much fun playing this I cant make justice with words. 10/10!!!
Great gameplay, great maps, great VA and lots of fun.
If you are looking for something diferent and engaging try this and you wont regreat.
Its relaxing and stressful (in a good way).
Use your logic to overcome the puzzles, enjoy the humorous VA and, when everything else fails, start shooting your portal gun on every single surface you see until your brain goes "Ahhhhh..... that could lead to something.....how did I not see that???...."
This is a really amazing game every gamer should play it. And that ending song, damn it's the most beatiful and meaningful song I've ever listened in video games.
Jogo muito bom com curto período mas com grande entreterimento
Un juego ya con unos cuantos años, pero todavia me sigue encantando, breve pero con muy buenos rompecabezas y algunos en los que te pones a pensar y luego te das cuenta que era muy facil

Aż dziw mnie bierze że kupiłem tą grę dopiero w 2016 roku...0 9 lat za późno. Naprawdę było warto zagrać! Gra ta ma bardzo ciekawą fabułę ale najważniejszą częścią składową tej gry są zagadki... Z początku banalne zagadki zmieniają się w coraz trudniejsze  nigdy jednak nie stają się jakieś bardzo wymagające. Jednakże prawdziwa zabawa zaczyna się po zakończeniu głównego wątku gry gdy dochodzą wyzwania, wtedy poziom trudności rośnie bardzo ale to bardzo więc są to mapy tylko dla pasjonatów główkowania, kombinowania a i niemałe umiejętności są do nich potrzebne aby ukończyć je na najwyższy wynik. Jako gracz który przeszedł tą grę na 100% jak najbardziej polecam i to dla każdego przedziału wiekowego.
To put it simply, this is one of the best games ever made.
Got this game now on the summer sale. Played some. Got addicted. Mom comes in my room and gets mad at me for not cleaning my room. 1000/10 would get mom mad again.
Juégalo ya o te quedarás sin tarta para el postre. 10/10

Cool.

* ENGLISH & ESPAÑOL *

[u]ENGLISH[/u]

Portal is a first-person puzzle using the FPS mechanic to solve most of its puzzles.

The game is pretty short but making it longer wouldn't making it better.

Outstanding mechanics, great sound and graphics (considering the game is from 2007). Some of the stages are challenging.

If you don't own it, buy it!

=============================

[u]ESPAÑOL[/u]

Portal es un juego de puzles en primera persona que usa la mecánica de los FPS (disparos en primera persona) para resolver la mayoría de sus puzles.

El juego es bastante corto pero no sería mejor si fuese más largo, está bien como está.

Espectaculares mecánicas, gran sonido y gráficos (teniendo en cuenta que el juego es del 2007). Algunas partes del juego son realmente desafiantes.

Si aún no tienes Portal... ¡cómpralo!
jos tykkäätte vaikeista peleist nii  täs teille yks
One of the best valve games ever made.
Played with the devs comments. Shows how the end result (the published game) is just the tip of the iceberg and succeeds a lot of iterations.

TLDR: Get the game in the bundle which features Portal 2 as well while on a sale. This game will cost right next to nothing. It is also fantastic, fun and original.

I already finished this game quite a while ago a few times, both on PS3 and on an older machine of mine. Other than that I want to say that this is one of the best Valve games ever (in my opinion, of course). The soundtrack is great but unfortunately you don't really hear it throughout the entire game. 
Gameplay is familiar to pretty much every popular Valve game (Counter Strike, Half Life, etc). Environments look cute. Puzzles are challenging and thought provoking. Really... REALLY good game. It is only about 3 hours which is just downright disappointing but on a sale (about £1.30+) it is really good. Rather fortunately you can get this game AND Portal 2 for just less than £4, making this game cost next to nothing (£0.10?).
This just goes to show how Valve publish some of the best games in all existance.
And MY GOD... that ending! Wow! Incredible! Won't spoil anything for you guys though, but it is really worth it, so don't skip anything! 
Even the credits!

Tem bolo no jogo.

10/10 - comeria o bolo de novo.

L'ho appena finito, e posso dire che l'ho trovato corto. In ogni caso non mi aspettavo molto da questo gioco, ma mi sono dovuto ricredere. Gameplay intelligente, situazioni divertenti e una storia a tratti inquietante lo rendono un gioco veramente bello; che ha come unico problema la durata, veramente molto breve.
